verbs.description: Special counsel Robert Mueller [V: is] accusing former Trump campaign manager Paul Manafort of tampering with witnesses while on house arrest in connection with the Russia probe .

[ARG0: Special counsel Robert Mueller] is [V: accusing] [ARG1: former Trump campaign manager Paul Manafort] [ARG2: of tampering with witnesses while on house arrest in connection with the Russia probe] .

Special counsel Robert Mueller is accusing [ARG0: former Trump campaign manager Paul Manafort] of [V: tampering] [ARG1: with witnesses] [ARGM-TMP: while on house arrest in connection with the Russia probe] .
